mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(title, writer, content) VALUES(#{title}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title=#{title}, writer=#{writer}, content=#{content} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board WHERE title content LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%') ORDER BY id DESC
